name: Wurfelspiel
description:
Würfelspiel is an arena fighter based on an old German dice game. Roll dice and randomly generate aspects of your music to create your own unique attack combination to face a variety of unique enemies! Usually these enemies are docile... what's making them act this way?

The game seems to lag when played in fullscreen. Also extremely sorry about a few of the UI bugs.

In the 18th century, a Musikalisches Würfelspiel (musical dice game) was used to randomly generate scores, selecting from precomposed segments. Used by Mozart and other legendary composers, the dice game could lead to over 750 trillion unique pieces of music.

This game was made in 48 hours for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam under the theme of "ROLL OF THE DICE"

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim + Shoot

KNOW YOUR ENEMY!
